snippet.title: POPGOES Evergreen - Office Prototype Preview
snippet.description:
Buy POPGOES Arcade: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1986840/POPGOES_Arcade/
Follow POPGOES Evergreen: https://gamejolt.com/games/evergreen/510665

Hi everyone!
Unfortunately a leak of POPGOES Evergreen's "station" or "office" (what do we even call it?!) panorama was released on YouTube a few days ago, so we've decided to show off the most recent version PROPERLY!
This is still somewhat of a WIP, and I would consider it a "prototype". Though the models here are final, the gameplay will include more effects, the phone itself will flicker in the dark (as seen in the 200% ending for POPGOES Arcade), and PANIC will have some visual "symptoms" as well. And of course the monitor will actually be turned on lol.
The music in the background is a real preview of the dynamic night ambience composed by Radiarc. It changes based on your perma-panic.
As it says at the end of the video, POPGOES Evergreen is indeed still early in development. If I said otherwise I would be lying - there is still a LOT to do.
That being said, POPGOES Arcade, a massive prologue RPG game did just release on Steam!

POPGOES is an official Five Nights at Freddy's spinoff series, developed by Kane Carter and produced/licensed by Scott Cawthon.
